name: Legacy (Redshift)
overview: It's dungeon crawler very similar in gameplay to Might and Magic series with some influences of Black Crypt. Use your weapons, spells and wit to defeat your villainous foes. In Legacy you have the opportunity to explore huge map areas each of which contain doorways to additional maps that are made up of multi-level towers or dungeons as well as swamps & forests. Three of these primary areas contain cities in which you can find places to rest and recruit party members as well as places to buy and sell items.
